effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.

short_effect.sword_shield: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
